install.name: RokMicroNews
install.author: RocketTheme, LLC
install.description: RokMicroNews is a news module designed to show section articles in a pleasing format. Brought to you by RocketTheme

param.name: article_count
param.label: Number of Articles
param.description: Number of articles to display from the section/category

param.name: preview_count
param.label: Preview Length
param.description: Length of characters of article to preview

param.name: mouse_type
param.label: Navigation Interaction
param.description: Wheter to change news via click or mouseover

param.name: open_type
param.label: First load status
param.description: How you want the MicroNews showing up at the very first load.

param.name: show_title
param.label: Show titles
param.description: Select whether to show the articles titles

param.name: show_controls
param.label: Show Controls
param.description: Show or Hide move and collapse control buttons

param.name: image
param.label: Show thumbnail
param.description: Select whether to show the thumbnail based on the first image in the article

param.name: user_id
param.label: Authors
param.option: Not added or modified by me

param.name: strip_tags
param.label: Tags to strip
param.description: Tags to strip from the content. Separated by comma, no spaces.

param.name: show_front
param.label: Frontpage Items
param.description: Show frontpage articles in this module

param.name: use_custom_css
param.label: Use Custom CSS
param.description: If you select yes, the module will not load it's own CSS file, and you must provide your own

param.name: module_cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
